fanwindow.config.title: FanWindow Config
fanwindow.config.useNewTitleScreen.descr:
New Title Screen will replace vanilla Title Screen.
If off, you can still toggle Title Screen through button.
fanwindow.config.description:
FanWindow is a mod only for redesigning your client screen. Contact with me for any problem.
You might need to restart Minecraft to make your changes in use.
fanwindow.config.background.description:
If in Disabled Mode, Pictures here will be shown as the New Background. Otherwise this option will be ignored.
At the end of the filename, use '_png' to replace with '.png'.
fanwindow.config.useNewBackgroundGloball: Use new Background instead of vanilla screen background
New background will replace all screen that use vanilla background globally.
fanwindow.config.useNewBackgroundInNewSc: Use new Background in New Screen
Not available when 「Use new Background instead of vanilla screen background」 is enabled.
fanwindow.config.useNewCreateWorldScreen: New Create World Screen improve the visual effect of the vanilla screen.
fanwindow.config.customBackgroundImageMo:
Disabled: using Picture chosen below, provided by Fan Window mod.
ResourcePack: using Picture provided in resourcepack.
ConfigDir: using Picture in Config Dir.
See document below for guidance to change your custom background.
fanwindow.config.customBackground.descri:
In Disabled mode, you can use one picture chosen below as background. In ResourcePack mode and ConfigDir mode you can change the background image through your heart.
For most player, you can toggle mode to ConfigDir, and move your beloved image (png) into 「.minecraft/config/fanwindow」 dir, rename it to 「custom.png」, and save your changes. Soon you can enjoy a new background image.
For support of ResourcePack mode, please see the GitHub of Fan Window mod.
BTW, if anything in Config Screen goes wrong, you might need to restart Minecraft to make it great again =w
